definition: rivers pour away by the day (idiom); going from bad to worse/deteriorating day by day
Heilongjiang River/Amur River (the border between northeast China and Russia)

sentences.english: The closure construction for offshore dyke engineering is different from the closure for river.
sentences.chinese: 沿海堤壩工程的合龍，不同於江河截流。

sentences.english: No such thing as a back-flow of ideas exists any more than there exists a return of a river on its course.
sentences.chinese: 思想並不比江河有更多倒退的餘地。

sentences.english: The seepage in riverbank generally induces the bank-collapse so it is one of the key points in the research of this area.
sentences.chinese: 岸坡滲流是江河崩岸的主要誘因和重要研究內容之一。

sentences.english: Drought has caused major problems for boats that use the Xiangjiang River in Hunan Province.
sentences.chinese: 乾旱給通過湖南省湘江河的船隻帶來嚴重的問題。

sentences.english: Almost 170 vessels have been held up at the Zhuzhou section in the river's upper reaches.
sentences.chinese: 將近170艘船停在株洲地區，湘江河的上游河段。

sentences.english: Mango is well-known as the king among the tropical fruits. It is abundant along the Youjiang River Valley of Baise.
sentences.chinese: 芒果稱爲“熱帶果王”，百色右江河谷芒果資源豐富。

sentences.english: Flood period is seasonal or periodic flood rise phenomenon of rivers.
sentences.chinese: 汛是指江河等水域的季節性或週期性的漲水現象。
生命的流逝像奔流的江河。

sentences.english: We will make continued innovation on the way to rehabilitate overloaded rivers and lakes.
sentences.chinese: 繼續創新讓不堪重負的江河湖海休養生息的有效途徑。

sentences.english: All rivers lead to the sea.
The eagle that soars in the upper air does not worry itself as to how it is to cross rivers. --Selected.
sentences.chinese: 高飛天空的鷲鷹，從不掛慮它將怎樣渡過江河。

sentences.english: Crater Lake is not connected to any rivers or streams.
sentences.chinese: 火山口湖不與任何江河相連接。

sentences.english: The wisdom of water makes rivers flow.
sentences.chinese: 水的智慧能疏通江河，可以自成盈滿。

sentences.english: 16 he brought streams out of a rocky crag and made water flow down like rivers.
sentences.chinese: 他使水從磐石湧出，叫水如江河下流。

sentences.english: Area as well as rivers and streams lake mine attack barrier warship.
sentences.chinese: 區以及江河湖泊佈設水雷障礙的軍艦。

sentences.english: As a river in the sea, work finds its perfection in the depth of leisure.
sentences.chinese: 猶如江河融入滄海，勞動於安逸中求得完美。

definition: to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current
